title: Exploring Reinforcement Learning-Based Control Algorithms: Learning AI Control Principles Through Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts, simple mathematical operations skills, and experience operating game interfaces
context.additional_context: Utilizing smartphone/tablet-based simulation tools in a BYOD environment. Intuitively understanding complex AI concepts through gamified learning content linked to daily life

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of reinforcement learning (reward-action mechanisms) in a simulation environment
Learners can perform a virtual pendulum balancing task with over 80% success rate using a Q-learning-based control algorithm
Learners can visually analyze the integration principles of neural network clustering (ARM) and reinforcement learning through simulation results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
